title: Aftershock
description: An adrenalin-fuelled action thriller - as global rescue team E-Force swoop into action on their second heart-stopping mission... For billionaire Michael Xavier, the opening of The Neptune Hotel in Fiji is the culmination of a childhood dream and an adult obsession - to build a luxury hotel, deep under water on the ocean bed. But during the glittering Opening Night Gala the unthinkable happens. There is a succession of explosions and aftershocks that destroy the hotel and leave a handful of survivors attempting the impossible - to escape from a crumbling building 100 metres deep in the ocean. Enter E-Force, the global rescue team, who race to the scene... But even for these experienced operatives this is one rescue they will never forget.
